title: Order your Halloween costume by these dates to make sure you get it on time
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle Canada is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

With Halloween just a few days away, there’s still time to order the costume of your dreams—but you may just have to add some extra shipping costs.

Many retailers are making it easy to shop right up until Oct. 30, so we’ve rounded up the last days that you can order by to get your costume delivered on time.

Spirit Halloween: Monday, Oct. 28

With a massive selection of costumes for the whole family, Spirit Halloween is a key shopping destination for costumes online. Standard shipping ($10.24) typically takes between six to 11 business days, so for a true last-minute shop, your best bet will be International Priority delivery ($50). It takes between one to three business days to get your costumes, so you’ll want to place your order by Monday, Oct. 28 at the latest.

Adult The Joker Suit. Image via Spirit Halloween. More

SHOP IT: Spirit Halloween, $92 ($70 USD)

Party City: Friday, Oct. 25

If you’re looking for party decor as well as costumes, you can get everything done in one place thanks to Party City. Be sure to place your order by Wednesday, Oct. 24 in order to get your costumes on time with standard shipping for $9.95. If you wait until Friday, Oct. 25, you’ll still have a chance to get your costume on time with DHL Express shipping, but it’ll cost you an extra $24.95. Any later than that, and you’ll have to head to the stores out in person for your costume.

Adult Princess Peach Costume Deluxe. Image via Party City. More

SHOP IT: Party City, $90

Amazing Party Store: Sunday, Oct. 27

For all things party, look no further than the Amazing Party Store. In order to get your Halloween costume on time, the website recommends placing your order by Sunday Oct. 27 at the latest. Standard shipping will set you back around $12, and express shipping starts at $20 to ship anywhere across the country.
